statements: SELECT * FROM Sales;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id FROM Sales WHERE sale_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE unit_price > 50.00 AND quantity >= 10;
SELECT sale_id, unit_price FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 1001 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity FROM Sales WHERE unit_price > 50.00;
SELECT AVG(unit_price), MAX(quantity) FROM Sales GROUP BY sale_date;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Sales GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, SUM(quantity * unit_price) AS total_sales FROM Sales GROUP BY sale_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT sale_id, revenue FROM Sales ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Inventory ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sales JOIN Inventory ON Sales.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, revenue FROM Sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_date, revenue FROM Sales INNER JOIN Inventory ON Sales.product_id = Inventory.product_id
SELECT * FROM sales;
SELECT transaction_id, quantity, total_price FROM sales WHERE product_id = 123;
SELECT product_id, unit_price, total_price FROM sales ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM revenue WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT product_id, turnover_date, sold_quantity FROM inventory_turnover WHERE remaining_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold FROM sales GROUP BY transaction_id ORDER BY total_quantity_sold DESC;
SELECT sale_date, total_revenue FROM revenue WHERE total_revenue > 10000 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_id, turnover_date, sold_quantity, remaining_quantity FROM inventory_turnover WHERE turnover_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT product_id, AVG(unit_price) AS average_price FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING AVG(unit_price) > 50 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, sale_amount FROM sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_type = 'financial'
SELECT * FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM sales GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_sales > 5000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, quantity, last_updated FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY last_updated;
SELECT report_id, report_type FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT sales.sale_id, sales.product_id, sales.sale_date, sales.sale_amount, revenue.revenue_amount FROM sales INNER JOIN revenue ON sales.product_id = revenue.product_id ORDER BY sales.sale_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE product_id = 1 AND sale_amount > 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY category, product_name;
SELECT report_date, sales_count, total_revenue FROM Reports WHERE total_revenue < 5000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales FROM Sales;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products JOIN Inventory ON Products.product_id = Inventory.product_id;
SELECT report_date, total_revenue FROM Reports ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
